requirements.value: Allows the activity definition to be referenced by a single globally unique identifier. This version of the profile requires url where the library of activityDefinitions are stored.
Allows externally provided and/or usable business identifiers to be easily associated with the module. This version of the profile requires at least one identifier.
This version of the profile requires at least one identifier.
Support human navigation and code generation. This version of the profile requires the name of the activityDefinition
This version of the profile requires a title which is used in an UI.
This version of the profile requires a date for when the ActivityDefinition was last changed
Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the activity definition. May also allow for contact. This version of the profile requires the name of the ActivityDefinition publisher.
This version of the profile requires a description of the ActivityDefinition.
Assist in searching for appropriate content. This version of the profile requires a useContext which is used to discover activityDefinitions of similar useContext.

Gives a sense of how "current" the content is. Resources that have not been reviewed in a long time may have a risk of being less appropriate/relevant. This version of the profile requires a date when the ActivityDefinition was last reviewed.
This version of the profile requires kind which is used to generate the request resources.
Allows prompting for activities and detection of missed planned activities. This version of the profile requires timing of when the activityDefinition is to occur.
